attributes.action: Demand a Full UK General Election Due to Government Betrayal of Public Trust
attributes.additional_details: Keir Starmer’s government has repeatedly undermined trust: re-aligning with EU governance without public consent, failing to defend UK industries like fishing, and expanding surveillance under facial recognition deals. The people have lost confidence and deserve to be heard through a fresh election.
attributes.background: We call for an immediate UK General Election. The Labour Government has betrayed its mandate through secretive EU negotiations, overreach of power, and disregard for fishing and national sovereignty.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
